tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_interactions ( 
    user_id INT, 
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50), 
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    preference_option VARCHAR(50), 
    interaction_details JSON, 
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, interaction_timestamp) 
);

CREATE TABLE SmartHomeDevices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(255),
    room_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserInteractions(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    home_theme VARCHAR,
    notification_enabled BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE interactions_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_details VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR,
    user_id INT,
    device_type VARCHAR,
    status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE smart_home_settings (
    setting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    automation_enabled BOOLEAN,
    temperature_unit VARCHAR,
    light_brightness INT
)
